com.webs.api.http
Interface HttpApiClientAware

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractHttpApiClientAware, AppApiImpl, MemberApiImpl, SiteApiImpl
public interface HttpApiClientAware

Interface to be used by any class which needs access to an HttpApiClient object. By abstracting out the HttpApiClient code, we're able to split up the class hierarchy, increase code reuse and allow for unit tests.

Author:
Patrick Carroll
See Also:
HttpApiClient

Method Summary
 void setHttpApiClient(HttpApiClient httpClient)
          Set the httpApiClient that will be used by the implementation
